name: Gradual Escalation Timeline
description: Starts with minor issues that gradually escalate to critical incidents

incidents.llm_prompt: Generate a minor performance degradation incident with low severity. Response times are slightly elevated (2x baseline) but service is functional.
Generate a medium severity incident where the previous performance issue has worsened. Response times are now 5x baseline and error rate has increased to 5%.

incidents.comment: Root cause identified - database queries are the bottleneck
Memory leak from database connection pool leak
Critical: Pods start crashing from OOM
